War practically perform'd: shewing all the requisites belonging to a land-army, in marches, battels, and sieges. / Deduced from ancient and modern discipline by the experience of Capt. Nath. Boteler. Boteler, Nathaniel.
[8], 246 p.
Printed for Peter Parker at the Sign of Leg over against the Royal Exchange in Cornhil, London, : 1672.
Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral.
